```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


https://biopython.org/wiki/SeqIO


```{python}
from Bio import SeqIO

record_dict = SeqIO.to_dict(SeqIO.parse("S288C_reference_sequence_R64-2-1_20150113.fsa", "fasta"))
my_list = list(record_dict.keys())

my_list[0]
my_list[0:3]

print(record_dict["ref|NC_001133|"])  # use any record ID
print(record_dict[my_list[0]])
print(record_dict[0:3])


SeqIO.write(record_dict["ref|NC_001133|"], "example.fasta", "fasta")


dict_you_want = {key: record_dict[key] for key in my_list[0:3]}
dict_you_want

SeqIO.write(dict_you_want, "example.fasta", "fasta")

```
